listings.title: Luxury 4-Bedroom Apartment in Victoria Island
listings.details: Fully furnished â€¢ 24/7 security â€¢ Swimming pool â€¢ Gym â€¢ Smart home
listings.description: This exquisite 4-bedroom apartment on Banana Island offers unparalleled luxury living in Lagos' most prestigious neighborhood. The 350sqm space features marble floors throughout, floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic ocean views, and a gourmet kitchen with imported Italian appliances. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and spa-style bathroom with Jacuzzi. Residents enjoy access to a state-of-the-art fitness center, 25m infinity pool, and 24-hour concierge service. The building features biometric security, backup power, and fiber internet. Located steps from upscale restaurants like Ocean Basket and The Place, this is perfect for executives who demand the finest. The property has been meticulously maintained with quarterly deep cleaning services. Landlord Mr. Adebayo (15 years experience) is known for his responsiveness and attention to tenant needs.

listings.title: 3-Bedroom Duplex in Maitama
listings.details: Spacious layout â€¢ Maid's quarters â€¢ Lush garden â€¢ Secure parking
listings.description: This beautifully designed 3-bedroom duplex in Abuja's diplomatic district offers 280sqm of refined living space. The property features a grand foyer with chandelier, formal dining room that seats 12, and a chef's kitchen with butler's pantry. The upstairs master wing includes a private balcony overlooking the landscaped garden with fountain. Staff accommodations include a self-contained BQ with separate entrance. The neighborhood is home to ambassadors and government officials, with armed security patrols every 2 hours. Located 5 minutes from Transcorp Hilton and Silverbird Cinemas. Landlord Hajia Fatima maintains the property to international standards and provides optional housekeeping services. Recent upgrades include solar panels and smart home automation. Ideal for diplomatic families seeking security and prestige.

listings.title: 2-Bedroom Flat in GRA Port Harcourt
listings.details: New construction â€¢ 24/7 electricity â€¢ Smart lighting â€¢ Fiber internet
listings.description: This contemporary 2-bedroom flat in Port Harcourt's Government Reserved Area offers 120sqm of modern living space designed for young professionals. The open-concept living area flows into a sleek kitchen with quartz countertops and breakfast bar. Both bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms with rain showers. The building includes a rooftop terrace with city views, co-working space, and resident's gym. Located 10 minutes from SPAR and Novare Mall, with easy access to major oil company offices. Landlord Engineer Williams built this property in 2022 using premium materials and offers flexible lease terms. The neighborhood is quiet yet convenient, with reliable municipal power and water supply. Perfect for expatriates or returning Nigerians seeking comfortable, low-maintenance living.

listings.title: 5-Bedroom Mansion in Lekki Phase 1
listings.details: Smart home â€¢ Cinema room â€¢ Staff quarters â€¢ Solar power
listings.description: This palatial 5-bedroom mansion in Lekki's most exclusive enclave spans 800sqm of living space on a 1,200sqm plot. The property features a grand double staircase entrance, home theater with 12 recliner seats, and a commercial-grade kitchen. The master suite occupies an entire wing with his-and-hers bathrooms and dressing rooms. Outdoors includes a heated Olympic-sized pool, tennis court, and landscaped gardens with gazebo. The basement contains a 10-car garage and panic room. Landlord Chief Okonkwo (20 years in luxury real estate) provides dedicated property management staff including gardener, pool attendant and security team. Located on a secured street with other high-profile residents, this is Lagos' ultimate status property.

listings.title: 1-Bedroom Apartment in Surulere
listings.details: Renovated â€¢ Secure estate â€¢ Backup generator â€¢ Walk to amenities
listings.description: This charming 1-bedroom apartment in Surulere's Golden Estate offers 45sqm of thoughtfully designed space perfect for singles or young couples. The open-plan living area features built-in shelving and a kitchenette with breakfast bar. The bedroom fits a queen bed with storage underneath, and the bathroom has modern fixtures. The gated community includes 24-hour security, shared generator, and weekly garbage collection. Located 5 minutes walk from National Stadium with its gym and pool facilities, and 10 minutes from Surulere's famous restaurants like Yellow Chilli. Landlord Mrs. Johnson (10 years renting to young professionals) is known for quick maintenance response and allows light personalization of units. Ideal for first-time renters seeking safety and convenience.

listings.title: 4-Bedroom Terrace House in Asokoro
listings.details: Diplomatic zone â€¢ Smart home â€¢ Staff quarters â€¢ Borehole
listings.description: This prestigious 4-bedroom terrace house in Asokoro's secure diplomatic enclave offers 320sqm of elegant living space. The property features a formal reception room with fireplace, family entertainment area, and study with custom wood paneling. The gourmet kitchen includes a walk-in pantry and breakfast nook. Upstairs, the master suite has a dressing room and balcony with city views. The basement includes a home gym and wine cellar. Landlord Alhaji Danjuma provides optional chef and driver services for tenants. The neighborhood features armed security patrols and is walking distance to embassies and international schools. Recent upgrades include smart lighting, water purification system, and backup solar power. Perfect for ambassadorial staff or corporate executives.

listings.title: 3-Bedroom Bungalow in Uyo
listings.details: Spacious compound â€¢ Fruit trees â€¢ Borehole â€¢ Quiet neighborhood
listings.description: This charming 3-bedroom bungalow in Uyo's Government Reserved Area sits on a 600sqm plot with mature mango and cashew trees. The 180sqm interior features a spacious living room with center table, formal dining area, and a practical kitchen with pantry. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and ensuite bathrooms. The wraparound veranda overlooks the lush garden with outdoor dining area. Landlord Professor Ekong (retired university lecturer) maintains the property meticulously and includes a gardener in the rent. Located in a quiet neighborhood of academics and professionals, just 10 minutes from University of Uyo and 15 minutes from Ibom Plaza shopping center. Ideal for families seeking space and tranquility.

listings.title: Executive 2-Bedroom Flat in Ikoyi
listings.details: Concierge service â€¢ Swimming pool â€¢ Gym â€¢ 24/7 security
listings.description: This premium 2-bedroom flat in Ikoyi's prestigious Dolphin Estate offers 110sqm of sophisticated living space. The interior features hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a modern open kitchen with breakfast bar. The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and marble bathroom with soaking tub. Residents enjoy access to the estate's Olympic-sized pool, tennis courts, and business center. The building has 24-hour security with CCTV, backup power, and high-speed internet. Located walking distance to upscale restaurants like RSVP and The Wheatbaker Hotel. Landlord Mrs. Adeleke (12 years managing luxury properties) provides weekly cleaning services and maintains an on-call maintenance team. Perfect for expatriates or executives seeking turnkey luxury living.

listings.title: 6-Bedroom Compound in Kano
listings.details: Traditional design â€¢ Large courtyard â€¢ 24/7 security â€¢ Borehole
listings.description: This expansive 6-bedroom family compound in Kano's prestigious Nassarawa GRA spans 1,000sqm of living space arranged around a central courtyard. The property features traditional Hausa architectural elements including arched doorways, intricate plasterwork, and a majlis reception area. The separate wings include a main family house, guest quarters, and staff accommodations. The landscaped grounds feature date palms, a vegetable garden, and outdoor dining area. Landlord Alhaji Dangote (25 years in Kano real estate) provides full-time security and maintenance staff. Located in a secure neighborhood of prominent businessmen and traditional rulers, just 10 minutes from Kano's commercial district. Ideal for extended families seeking traditional luxury with modern comforts.

listings.title: Studio Apartment in Yaba
listings.details: Minimalist design â€¢ Shared gym â€¢ Rooftop lounge â€¢ Secure access
listings.description: This stylish 30sqm studio apartment in Yaba's new tech hub is perfect for young professionals. The space features a convertible sofa-bed, compact kitchenette with induction cooktop, and a smart bathroom with water-saving fixtures. The building offers co-working spaces on each floor, a shared gym, and a rooftop lounge with skyline views. Located adjacent to Co-Creation Hub and walking distance to UNILAG, it's ideal for tech entrepreneurs and graduate students. Landlord Mr. Balogun (former tech founder) has equipped the building with fiber internet and offers flexible lease terms. The neighborhood boasts trendy cafes like CCHub's Vibes and several coworking spaces. Perfect for digital nomads seeking community and convenience.

listings.title: 3-Bedroom Penthouse in Abuja
listings.details: Panoramic views â€¢ Smart home â€¢ Private elevator â€¢ Concierge
listings.description: This luxurious 3-bedroom penthouse in Abuja's tallest residential tower offers 280sqm of living space with breathtaking city views. The open-plan living area features floor-to-ceiling windows, a gourmet kitchen with marble countertops, and a dining area that seats 10. The master suite includes a private terrace, walk-in closet, and spa bathroom with rainforest shower. Building amenities include a sky lounge, infinity pool, and 24-hour concierge service. Landlord Senator Mark (10 years developing premium properties) provides optional housekeeping and chef services. Located in Central Business District, walking distance to Transcorp Hilton and Nicon Luxury. Perfect for high-net-worth individuals seeking prestige and privacy.

listings.title: 2-Bedroom Flat in Enugu
listings.details: Quiet neighborhood â€¢ Water supply â€¢ Close to market â€¢ Secure
listings.description: This comfortable 2-bedroom flat in Enugu's Independence Layout offers 85sqm of practical living space. The unit features a bright living room with balcony, functional kitchen with ample storage, and two well-proportioned bedrooms. The compound includes a shared generator, water reservoir, and 24-hour security. Located on a quiet street just 5 minutes from Roban Stores and 10 minutes from Polo Mall. Landlord Mr. Okeke (retired civil servant) maintains the property meticulously and is known for fair treatment of tenants. The neighborhood is popular with mid-level professionals and small families seeking affordability without sacrificing security. Easy access to major government offices and schools.

listings.title: 4-Bedroom Villa in Calabar
listings.details: Ocean view â€¢ Private garden â€¢ Modern kitchen â€¢ Staff quarters
listings.description: This stunning 4-bedroom villa in Calabar's Marina Resort area offers 300sqm of luxurious living space with panoramic ocean views. The property features an open-plan living area with vaulted ceilings, a chef's kitchen with granite countertops, and a covered veranda perfect for outdoor dining. The master suite includes a private balcony, walk-in closet, and marble bathroom. The landscaped garden features a gazebo and small swimming pool. Landlord Mrs. Duke (15 years in hospitality) provides optional housekeeping and chef services. Located in a gated community just 5 minutes from Tinapa Business Resort and Calabar Marina. Perfect for expatriates or retirees seeking coastal luxury.
